pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 10, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Edmonton, Alberta

11:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Edmonton, Don Iveson.

Edmonton Convention Centre
9797 Jasper Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to present themselves at the Hall D Foyer on the Pedway Level no later than 10:45 a.m.

11:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks to highlight the Municipal Infrastructure Top-Up, and will hold a media availability. Minister of Natural Resources Amarjeet Sohi will be in attendance.

Edmonton Convention Centre
9797 Jasper Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to present themselves at the Hall D Foyer on the Pedway Level no later than 10:45 a.m.
